welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Claude, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque views. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is used for flights operated by Swiss International Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for flights operated by other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Annemasse Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
